I know the software is unable to show pictures, play music with the server however, does anyone have an idea of how you could perhaps reference a picture for a particular room. Can URL's be used? Or someone offer some other creative idea?

May give a reference to a gallery of pictures perhaps, be a little awkard but if someone wanted to see what a room looked like at least they could look. Hope this makes sense.
